name: Callous
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Click on totems (which take the form of miscellaneous objects) inside of the mind of Samuel to enter a deeper state of mind.

Use touchstones to abandon a level of consciousness and get back to the previous one. You can find them lying on the floor sometimes...

Samuel is haunted by the ghosts of his past. Don't get caught by them or you will lose all your touchstones!

Find the cypher codes to unlock each new area, and find the origin of Samuel's disease.

CONTROLS:

  • Left Mouse Button - Interact
  • Right Mouse Button - Use Touchstone
  • Mouseover edges of the screen - Walk
